Player History
Earned first career win on 4/13/1965...
Had first career hit on 6/4/1965, off Clay Carroll (MIL)...
Signed as a free agent by Chicago (A) on 3/1/1971 to a minor league contract.
Drafted in 1st round, 1st overall pick, by Philadelphia in 1976...
Traded from Philadelphia to Los Angeles on 2/20/1976 (Going to LA: 3B W. Boggs. Going to PHI: C G. Keatley)...
Traded from Los Angeles to Atlanta on 5/1/1980 (Going to ATL: 3B W. Boggs, CF R. Henderson, 2B M. Barrett, P R. St. Claire. Going to LA: P B. Dillman, C B. Downing)...
Had first career hit on 4/1/1984, off Dennis Eckersley (STL)...
Hit first career homerun on 4/8/1984, off Nolan Ryan (CIN)...
Injured on 9/4/1985 with a Pulled Elbow Ligament, out for 1-2 weeks...
